markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hyena Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=5591) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 18 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Hyenas serve kholo as pets and trackers. Some kholos, such as yourself, draw the attention of smaller hyenas that are vessels for magical spirits. You gain a Tiny hyena as a [familiar](/Rules.aspx?ID=2121).
name: Hyena Familiar
